title: Married Three Months and I Feel Trapped
description:
Here's what's happening on today's show:

A man whose been married three months asks John why he feels trapped.  (2:25)

We hear from a woman whose teen daughter keeps finding ways to talk to strange men online. (20:00)

We talk with a mom wondering how to best support her daughter as she grows up with a chronic illness. (35:47)

Lyrics of the Day: "Demons" - Imagine Dragons


Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
 Support Our Sponsors:

Churchill Mortgage
